metadata.title: CVE-2016-3741 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The H.264 decoder in mediaserver in Android 6.x before 2016-07-01 does notinitialize certain slice data, which allows remote attackers to executearbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via acrafted media file, aka internal bug 28165661.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
